p: A number other VLP-based vaccines are in clinical trials. These include the anti-influenza A M2-HBcAg VLP vaccine ( Clarke et al., 1987), two antimalarial vaccine nicotine-Qβ VLPs ( Maurer et al., 2005), and an anti-AngIIQβ VLP. The VLP production in mammalian cell lines and Baculo cell lines of viruses infecting humans and other animals is summarized in Table 14.6 .
